attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we believe that the current bad behaviour of the press should be curtailed. Specifically we want an end to entrapment by the press, we want to see reform of our privacy laws. We believe that it is the duty of the press of a nation to enlighten and to serve. To often the press is now setting the agenda, the government should act to stamp its authority on the nation.
